title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 79.15 - Brakes and two-way radio required
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 79.15 - Brakes and two-way radio required

State Regulations

Except when landing as a result of an in-flight emergency, no aircraft shall land upon, operate on the surface of, or take-off from the
airport unless it is equipped with operable wheel brakes and functioning radio
capable of direct two-way communication with the airport traffic control
tower. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
79.15

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
